Class ReportController

java.lang.Object
com.SC2002.bto.control.ReportController
public class ReportController extends Object
ReportController handles the generation of reports for the BTO Management System. Follows the Dependency Inversion Principle by depending on service interfaces.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    ReportController()
    Constructs a ReportController with the default services.
    ReportController(IProjectService projectService, IApplicationService applicationService)
    Constructs a ReportController with the specified services.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    String
    generateApplicantReport(List<User> users)
    Generates a report on applicants, including their status and application details.
    String
    generateFlatBookingReport(List<Project> projects)
    Generates a report on flat bookings, including availability and booking status.

  • Method Details

    • generateApplicantReport

      public String generateApplicantReport(List<User> users)
      Generates a report on applicants, including their status and application details.
      Parameters:
      users - the list of users to include in the report.
      Returns:
      a formatted string containing the applicant report.

    • generateFlatBookingReport

      public String generateFlatBookingReport(List<Project> projects)
      Generates a report on flat bookings, including availability and booking status.
      Parameters:
      projects - the list of projects to include in the report.
      Returns:
      a formatted string containing the flat booking report.
